ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 51
ygData.msgSnippet: ... spells that are completly usless to us?? ... 1.)  Identify supposedly works to show lore for a particular item, it s just that it has been said not very
ygData.messageBody:
> ----- Original Message -----
> Also, anyone else notice that FLARE no longer works? That makes what 4
spells that are completly usless to us??
> 1) Identify
> 2) Sense Magic
> 3) Sense Summoned (practically usless in it's current form)
> 4) Flare (since most recent patch)
>
> anyone find any other spells not working at all? or as intended?
>
> Meraxes Glibilskym, Fennin Ro.


1.) Identify supposedly works to show lore for a particular item, it's just
that it has been said not very many items have lore to divulge.
2.) Sense Magic is pretty useless, and Verant has said they will be
replacing it with something in the future. Anyone with the spell already in
their spell books will automatically have it replaced with the new spell.
3.) Sense Summoned I have really never used so I'll take the word of those
who commented on using it.
4.) Flare I also have never used so I can't comment on it.

Ylandril Feanaro <Soulforge>
High Elf Wizard of the 7th Initiate
Mithaniel Marr
